snippet: Arizona State’s Edward Sarafin is the first active Division I football player to come out.
abstract: Arizona State backup offensive lineman Edward Sarafin says he is gay, making him first active Division 1 football player to come out publicly.
lead_paragraph: Arizona State’s Edward Sarafin is the first active Division I football player to come out.

headline.main: At A.S.U., Division I Football Has First Openly Gay Player
headline.print_headline: At A.S.U., Division I Football Has First Openly Gay Player
